title: RBI sees moderation in unsecured retail loans, tells banks to maintain prudent asset-liability balance
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) noted a moderation in unsecured retail loans and advances following concerns raised in November 2023. Governor Shaktikanta Das highlighted that growth in personal loans and NBFC funding reliance has slowed. The RBI continues to monitor these trends and has urged financial institutions to maintain risk within acceptable limits.
